verbs.description: [ARG0: russia] megafon [V: sues] [ARG1: hewlett packard] [ARGM-TMP: in u s] [ARG2: over network outages] moscow nov 6- megafon russia no 2 mobile phone operator is suing hewlett packard enterprise in a california court over major outages on its cellular network court documents show the suit filed in the u s district court northern district of california san jose division on oct 23 alleges that hpe russia division signed a deal worth more than 28 million in megafon u s united states district court moscow reuters san jose division u s district court hewlett packard russia hpe
